solution_line_template: She put half in her savings account and half in her wallet, so she had {after_milkshake} / {savings_divisor} = $<<{after_milkshake}/{savings_divisor}={wallet_money}>>{wallet_money} in her wallet.

Her dog shredded all the money in her wallet but ${money_left_after_dog}, so Leah lost {wallet_money} - {money_left_after_dog} = $<<{wallet_money}-{money_left_after_dog}={dollars_lost}>>{dollars_lost}.
